title: Horse with rider, from an equestrian set
description: standing horse with rider on its back; rider\'s head is detachable; horse has large head and short legs; horse and rider are both wearing armor; horse has mask with a three pointed shield atop its head; mounded hole at center of horse\'s back; rider wears a conical hat; empty horse eye sockets
creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
